body.name: WIZCHARK 9" Large Lighted Makeup Mirror, 1X/10X Magnifying Vanity Mirror with 3 Colors Dimmable Lightning, 80 LED Lights, 360°Rotation Double Sided Standing Desk Mirror
features: 【9 Inch Large Makeup Mirror and 80 LEDs Super Bright Light】Wizchark makeup mirror with lights and magnification allows you to put on makeup and check your grooming in places where there is not enough light, with sufficient 80pcs led lights to provide stable ultra-bright and soft eye-protection light source. The color rendering index (CRI) exceeds 97. Other ordinary makeup mirrors are generally only about 80. No Visible Strobe Features.NOTE： ACTUAL SIZE OF THE MIRROR IS 7 INCHES.

【3 Dimmable Colors Light Modes】The light up mirrors for makeup with HD effect are designed with 3 color lights: Cool/Warm/Natural. Short press the sensor POWER switch to turn on/off the light, long-press the “P” button to adjust the brightness, and tape the “N “button to change the light color to meet your needs in different circumstances.

【1X/10X Double-Sided Magnifying Mirror】Getting all details of your faces with a 10X magnifying cosmetic mirror, which is ideal for make-up, eyebrow tweezing, facial care, and hair styling. The led makeup mirror can be 360 swivel freely. Easy to find the perfect viewing angle of this vanity mirror with lights without effort.Note: You should be at least with a distance of 4 inches to mirror for a more detailed and less distorted image or dizzying.

【Cordless and Rechargeable Mirror】The rechargeable led mirrors with a 2000mAh capacity battery are convenient to bring when traveling. The mirror can be used for 3-5 hours when fully charged. With a 1-hour auto shutdown function to save energy. Detailed Anti-slip base design at the bottom to prevent tipping over. Our lighted makeup mirror with magnification is perfect for makeup application in any setting like a bedroom, dressing room, or bathroom.

【What Included】9 Inch Makeup Mirror*1, Type C charger*1. If there is an issue when you receive or use this magnifying mirror with light, please feel free to contact us anytime through Amazon message and we will respond to you within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wizchark 9 Inch Rechargable 1X/10X Makeup Mirror with 3 Colors Dimmable Lights WIZCHARK 1X/10X Makeup Mirror with Magnifiction A good beauty routine is all about precision. our round-shaped lighted mirror combines 3 dimmable light settings and 10X magnification to illuminate your facial features so you can effortlessly see every detail and always know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. Note:The light up makeup mirror is 30 mins auto off for safety protection and energy efficience. FAQ What can do I do if the Image is too distorted for using? Please keep within 4 inch distance to avoid dizzy. Why the lights don't work right, the makeup mirror is won't charged or mirror is broken? The makeup mirror may be broken during the shipping. Why the mirror turns off automatically without turning it off? We set the 30 mins auto off for the safety protection and energy efficiency.Hope for your understanding.

Features 80 Pcs Led LIGHTS Super Brightness This vanity mirror with lights has 80 led lights, illuminating all details of your face, which is ideal for eyebrow trimming, facial care in any circumstances. Detachable Base The base is detachable, so it can be applicable or a hand mirror. Lightweight material makes more convenient for travel. Usb C Port Rechargeable Lighted makeup mirror with magnification is rechargeable and cordless. Recharge with included USB-C charging cord – one charge lasts up to 3-5 hours.

1X/10x Double Sided Table Mirror 1X/10X 9 Inch Large Magnifying Makeup Mirror 1X for an all-over look of your face can check completed makeup. 10X magnifying mirror for detailed makeup such as eyeliner, eyebrow, eye shadow, shaving, and lipstick. Note: Please keep your face within 4 inches from the 10X mirror to get a clear view.
Best Gift for Mother. Gilfriend, Best Friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mirror
reviews.reviewText: This is a rechargeable device. Just plug it in using a mini USB and you have light for quite a while. Looks nice on a vanity. The touch on/off button right on the glass is a cool feature. The grand kids think it's a great toy as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This make-up mirror is great. The size and convenience of being able to use it wherever I need is a huge plus. This is better than the flimsy LED one I had previously. This one is well made, good quality and the brushed nickel is attractive. I also love the 10X; that is a huge plus when I need that magnification. My only complaint, I wish the light was brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars All the features I wanted
reviews.reviewText: This imirror is larger than many others, really allowing you to view the entire face without having to move back from the mirror.I really like that it is rechargeable and is two sided. One side is normal view and the other is magnification.I the pedestal stand puts it at a good height to apply makeup .The brightness is almost Too bright. I always turn it down just a bit.Would definitely recommend this mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE JANUARY 2024 - REPLACEMENT
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE (January 2024) - WIZCHARK reached out to me after realizing my concerns with the mirror. They have since sent me a replacement. It's SO MUCH better. Much brighter and it was easier to attach the mirror to the base! I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend this seller!Not much to say. It's a mirror. It doesn't stay together too well, but the worst part is the complete ack of a bright light. It doesn't matter how long you charge it. It's simply too dark to do anything with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Makeup Every Time
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is a gem! It is nicely made, has three different color tones, swivels easily, and magnifies a LOT!If you cannot bear to look at your pores, freckles, dark spots, and wrinkles, this is not for the faint-hearted.BUT, it is such a good magnifier that you can apply your make up perfectly every time. Excellent.I would not try to travel with is as it is so large and would be hard to pack and protect, but I keep it near my dressing table and use it to "correct" my makeup, and for that it is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its the same size as most mirrors. I love the touch screen and the light changes. However the charge doesn't last long and the way I could tell was that the light got really dim. Otherwise this is a great mirror just be aware of the charging feature. It is nice not to have a cord attached to the mirror and makes it easy to move around. The color of the mirror looks good and the touch screen options work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't expect this to exceed my expectations! But...
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is what I have wanted for about 20 years and none that I bought fit the bill. This mirror is well made. It is heavy, which is needed on the bathroom counter. The lighting is outstanding. I can play with the lights all day. ANd then the 10X mirror, I just love it! It is a little scary when I look at 10 times myself, but I will get used to it. The shape of the base is perfect for my house. And, of my whole big order, the mirror and my dog's biscuits came the next day! My only complaint is that I could see more wrinkles on my face than on my other mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The mirrors & lights are great
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like having to constantly charge it, the charge doesn’t last long
